title: [bug][js API] setBackgroundColor

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

Hi, following this PR https://github.com/tauri-apps/tauri/pull/11486,
I'm trying to set the background color of the webview's window via the Js API

```js
import { getCurrentWindow } from '@tauri-apps/api/window';

const window = getCurrentWindow();
await window.setBackgroundColor(theme === 'Dark' ? '#1C1B1F' : '#F2F4F6');
```

But at runtime, it fails with the following error `window.set_background_color not allowed. Command not found`

It looks like a permissions issue? But so far can't figure out what is the expected one.
